title: (x) Sons & Co wordmark - Hoefler Text {Florian}
content:
Here is the wordmark for Sons & Co.

Can anyone identify the typeface used?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sonsandco.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042818/http:/typophile.com/files/sonsandco.gif) | 4.61 KB |
author: bjk

comments.content:
Hi bjk,

that looks like [Hoefler Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042818/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100010).  
F

——  
 [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202042818/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")
Right on. Thank you for the help!
